attributes.action: Guarantee the Falkland Islands potential Oil and Gas stores remain within British control and not yeild to the demands of the Amercian Subcontinent.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Prime Minister should not yield to any pressure from any countries in the Amercian Subcontinent. 
These are our Islands and the coastal waters around these Islands are British property. 
Many British died to protect these Islands in 1982. This will be a hollow victory if we are not strong and refuse any claim from Argentina.
